thread.title: Troll Tries to Test Gospel Singer Kirk Franklin, and Twitter Is Loving His Clap Back
thread.title_full: Troll Tries to Test Gospel Singer Kirk Franklin, and Twitter Is Loving His Clap Back

author: Joshua Espinoza
title: Troll Tries to Test Gospel Singer Kirk Franklin, and Twitter Is Loving His Clap Back
text:
0 Image via Getty/Erika Goldring In the wake of Donald Trump ’s travel ban on certain Muslim-majority nations , a slew of celebrities have come forth to not only condemn the order, but to also provide a few words of hope and encouragement. On Saturday night, gospel singer Kirk Franklin joined the conversation with tweet that promoted unity and acceptance. This, of course, upset a few people; however, there was one particular troll who wasn’t ready for Franklin’s clap back. 
. @kirkfranklin I trust u'll be leaving ur doors unlocked tonight. Oh & ur brothers want to know if u have a daughter. — The History Carper (@HistoryCarper) January 29, 2017 Franklin response? Well, let's just say he isn't about to turn the other cheek. 
@HistoryCarper yes I have a daughter and the ability to protect her. Please come so I can have a reason to introduce you to it in Jesus name — Kirk Franklin (@kirkfranklin) January 29, 2017 Franklin is clearly not to be messed with. And Twitter immediately gave him a around of applause. Check out some of the reactions to the exchange below. 
Y'all Trump Supporters got Kirk Franklin out here like: pic.twitter.com/zG35gFSbNr
